Q: Will I be charged With Holding Tax (WHT) on my investment?
A: No. All interest payable are WHT free.

Q: Is my deposit secured with Initiative Moni?
A: Yes. It is a CBN regulated financial institution.

Q: Can I run multiple investments on the app?
A: Yes

Q: Can I get an investment advice for my investment?
A: Yes

Q: Can I terminate my investment before maturity?
A: Yes but there will be a penal charge.

Q: Can I terminate part of investment?
A: Yes but the investment must have lasted for 30 days.

Q: Can I invest more than 5 million?
A: Yes

Q: Is it possible to pay-off my loan before due date?
A: Yes

Q: Can I get a loan more than N200,000 from the app?
A: No but you can contact the help line.

Q: How can I access other services?
A: You have to contact our customer care representative.

Q: Can I invest less than N50,000?
A: No

Q: How much will be charged on my interest at maturity?
A: Nothing

Q: Can I save my money on the app?
A: No. Initiative Moni does not do savings but investment.

Q: Is it compulsory to add my BVN?
A: Yes

Q: Which phone number can I use on the app?
A: The phone number linked with your BVN is advisable.

Q: Is my BVN secured on the app?
A: Yes

Q: Can I take a loan lower than N5,000?
A: No

Q: How can I apply for a loan?
A: On the home screen, click on get a loan and follow the procedure.

Q: Can I increase my loan amount?
A: No, once you completed your loan application, you cannot increase your loan.

Q: How quickly can I get money into my bank account if approved?
A: Funds are disbursed in less than 30 minutes.

Q: Can I payoff my loan early?
A: Yes. You can pay off your loan at any time prior to the date without a prepayment fee.

Q: Can I deter a payment?
A: No, you cannot.

Q: Do I need to earn a minimum income in order to be approved a loan?
A: We only require that applicants have sufficient income to repay their loan obligation.

Q: How long will it take for my loan to be process?
A: Loan is processed immediately you complete the loan application process  giving his/her accurate information to all compulsory requirements.

Q: Why my application was/can is declined?
A: Some of the names could include low credit score, wrong BVN, bad credit report, DSCR (Debt credit coverage ratio) above 33.33%. You can contact our helpline for more information.

Q: Do you charge a late if I miss a loan payment?
A: Yes

Q: What is the minimum I can invest?
How long can I invest for?
A: 1 – 12 months. If you wish to invest on maturity after your investment has been paid, it just takes a few clicks on your Initiative Moni app.

Q: Can I top up an existing investment?
A: Yes

Q: Is there any fee/charge to be paid to have an Initiative Moni investment account?
A: No. There are no charges.

Q: How do I monitor my investment?
A: The application will always show you real time information on your earnings.

Q: How is my protected?
A: Your funds are safe as they are managed by Initiative Finance Limited (RC: 1112088) which is licensed and regulated by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN).

Q: What is a maturity date?
A: This is a rainy day when your investment completes its agreed time period and you can receive your full principal and interest payment to your account.

Q: What is Initiative Moni?
A: Initiative Moni is Initiative Finance Limited’s mobile platform that helps you grow your wealth in a secure and transparent style.

Q: How much interest do I get on my Initiative Moni investment?
A: Rates vary depending on the investment duration selected.
All interest payments are WHT free.
